title: Wearable with flexible display set to blow your mind next year
text:
Wearable with flexible display set to blow your mind next year 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
A new wearable is set to make devices like the Apple Watch and the LG Urbane look like old-fashioned junk. Wove might cause a twinge of nost...
